summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all 8 requirements with backend CRUD operations, frontend views (dashboard, calendar, list), appointment form, alarm notifications, and cohesive visual design. However, some minor implementation details differ from specifications, and the required image files are referenced but not generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Clean calendar icon illustration with minimal design in sage green on cream background (calendar-icon.dim_128x128.png)
missing_requirements.reason: The image file is referenced in App.tsx but not present in the added files list. The diff summary indicates 1 file was omitted due to limits, which may be this image.

missing_requirements.requirement: Clock/alarm icon illustration with modern styling in muted teal (alarm-icon.dim_128x128.png)
missing_requirements.reason: The required alarm icon image is not present in the added files, though it was specified in the BuildRequest images section.

missing_requirements.requirement: Users can filter appointments by date range
missing_requirements.reason: The AppointmentList component implements search by title but does not include date range filtering functionality as specified in the acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation includes a complete Internet Identity provider with login/logout functionality, but authentication was not mentioned in any requirement or constraint. The BuildRequest specified single-user functionality with no multi-user collaboration.
The CSS includes complete dark mode color definitions and ThemeProvider integration, but dark mode was not requested in REQ-8 or anywhere in the BuildRequest.
The footer includes promotional branding and UTM tracking links for caffeine.ai, which was not requested in any requirement.
